title: Did CNN say that " Trump Abe killed the unarmed three after the Baghdadite's death?
subtitle: The announcement of the death of Abubakar al-Baghdadi, the terrorist leader of the Islamic State, was surrounded by misleading information.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: CNN Shireon regarding the death of the terrorist leader Abubakar al-Baghdadi reads, "Trap kills the father of three unarmed men."
